sentences.english: To explore the significance of adenosine deaminase in patients with tuberculous pleurisy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺苷脱氨酶在结核性胸膜炎中的临床意义。

sentences.english: The acute pleurisy model was established by injecting carrageenan.
sentences.chinese: 注射角叉菜胶以建立急性胸膜炎模型。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the role of nutritional support in the treatment of tuberculous pleurisy .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨营养支持在结核性胸膜炎治疗中的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical traits of tuberculo pleurisy and discuss the therapy schedule.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结结核性胸膜炎的临床特点，并探讨治疗方案。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of intrapleural urokinase in the treatment of pleural thickening and loculated pleural effusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胸腔内注射尿激酶治疗结核性胸膜炎的效果。
咳嗽，呼吸困难，胸膜炎，发烧。

sentences.english: Pleurisy can also be one of the signs of some cancers.
sentences.chinese: 性胸膜炎也可以是其中一个迹象某些癌症。

sentences.english: Pneumonia may be complicated by a pleuritis.
sentences.chinese: 肺炎也可能并发胸膜炎。

sentences.english: Pleurisy was produced by intra-pleural injection of carrageenan in rats.
sentences.chinese: 以角叉菜胶胸腔内注入形成大白鼠胸膜炎。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the reasons for the develpment of pleural thickening among pulmonary tuberculosis effusion patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结核性渗出性胸膜炎发生胸膜增厚的原因。

sentences.english: To summarize the clinical traits of tuberculo pleurisy and discuss the treatment methods.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结结核性胸膜炎的临床特点，并探讨治疗方案。
